component.notes: ====================== Change Log ================== Version: 1.3 Change: Version Number bump to support new Savant Revisioning Scheme. Risk: Low Importance: Forced

action_argument.name: InputNumber
action_argument.note: 1 - HDMI1, 15 - HDMI2, 2 - DVI, 14 - Component, 7 - VGA, 9 - S-Video, 10 - Video

action_argument.name: PureDemoNumber
action_argument.note: Values: 0 - Off, 1 - H Split, 2 - V Split

action_argument.name: InputSourceFilterNumber
action_argument.note: Values: 1 - HDMI1, 7 - HDMI2, 2 - DVI, 8 - Component, 5 - VGA, 9 - S-Video, 10 - Video

action_argument.name: LanguageNumber
action_argument.note: Values: 1 - English, 2 - German, 3 - French, 4 - Italian, 5 - Spanish, 6 - Portugese, 7 - Polish, 8 - Dutch, 9 - Swedish, 10 - Norwegian/Danish, 11 - Finnish, 12 - Greek, 13 - Traditional Chinese, 14 - Simplified Chinese, 15 - Japanese, 16 - Korean, 17 - Russian, 18 - Hungarian, 19 - Czechoslovak, 20 - Arabic, 21 - Thai, 22 - Turkish

action_argument.name: MenuLocationNumber
action_argument.note: Values: 1 - Top Left, 2 - Top Right, 3 - Center, 4 - Bottom Left, 5 - Bottom Right
